get.description: Retrieves all contact lists for an organization with pagination, filters, and aggregated counts of campaign IDs.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for filtering lists by name or description

parameters.name: myContactList
parameters.description: Filter to show only contact lists created by the current user

get.description: Retrieves all contacts in the organization with optional search filtering and pagination. Search is optional - omit to get all contacts.

200.description: All contacts retrieved successfully with pagination

get.description: Retrieve events for the organization with optional filtering by status, type, etc.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by event status (comma-separated for multiple statuses)

parameters.name: startDateFrom
parameters.description: Filter events starting from this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: startDateTo
parameters.description: Filter events starting until this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in event name or description

parameters.name: myEvents
parameters.description: Filter to show only events created by current user

get.description: Retrieve campaigns for the organization with optional filtering by status, search, etc.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in campaign name or description

parameters.name: createdFrom
parameters.description: Filter campaigns created from this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: createdTo
parameters.description: Filter campaigns created until this date (ISO 8601)

parameters.name: myCampaigns
parameters.description: Filter to show only campaigns created by current user

get.summary: Get campaigns with pagination and filtering

get.description: Retrieve all recipients for a specific campaign with pagination support

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search recipients by first name or last name

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by recipient status. Can be comma-separated for multiple statuses

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Filter recipients by assigned user ID. Shows only recipients assigned to this user

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort by field (createdAt, updatedAt, firstName, lastName, status, email, or company). Default sorts by ready status first, then createdAt descending.

parameters.name: feedback
parameters.description: Filter by feedback presence (true for recipients with feedback, false for recipients without feedback)

get.summary: Get campaign recipients with pagination

post.description: Add new contacts to an existing live campaign. Creates recipients, landing pages, claim pages, and sends emails following the same flow as campaign launch.

200.description: Contacts added to live campaign successfully

400.description: Invalid request data or campaign not live

post.summary: Add contacts to a live campaign

post.description: Add a new recipient to an existing campaign by providing contact details. This will create the contact if it doesn't exist, create a recipient, handle wallet deduction, create landing/claim pages, and send emails following the same flow as campaign creation.

parameters.name: campaignId
parameters.description: Campaign ID to add the recipient to

400.description: Bad request - invalid data or insufficient wallet balance

404.description: Campaign not found or campaign not in live status

post.summary: Add a recipient to a campaign with contact details

totalRecipientsInCampaign.description: Total number of recipients in campaign across all statuses

404.description: Campaign not found or no express-send recipients found

info.title: DelightLoop Campaign Service API
info.description: DelightLoop Campaign Service API enables businesses to create personalized customer experiences through automated campaigns. Manage contact lists, design multi-touch campaigns, track recipients, handle gift fulfillment, and analyze engagement metrics. Our platform helps you build stronger customer relationships through thoughtful, data-driven interactions.

manual.description: Indicates if list was created manually

csv.description: Indicates if list was imported from CSV

totalRecipients.description: Total number of recipients in this campaign

count.description: Number of assignments for this user

totalRecipients.description: Total number of recipients in the campaign

totalGiftsSent.description: Total number of gifts sent (recipients with shipmentInfo)

totalFeedback.description: Total number of recipients who provided feedback

pendingConfirmation.description: Number of recipients pending address confirmation

launchCount.description: Number of recipients ready to be launched

prepareCount.description: Number of recipients in preparing status

totalFeedback.description: Total number of recipients who provided feedback

totalDelivered.description: Total number of gifts delivered in the organization in the last 30 days

totalAcknowledged.description: Total number of acknowledged gifts in the organization in the last 30 days

acknowledgmentPercentage.description: Percentage of delivered gifts that were acknowledged

Total number of matches found across all searches

results.description: Processing results for each search item organized by match type

matchReason.example: Exact first name and last name match

text.example: Thank you for the amazing gift!

contactIds.description: Array of contact IDs to add to the live campaign

message.example: Successfully added 3 new recipients to live campaign

emailsSent.description: Number of emails sent immediately (if applicable)

contactDetails.description: Contact details for the new recipient

sourceType.description: Source type for the contact creation

emailSent.description: Whether an email was sent immediately

creditsDeducted.description: Wallet credits deducted for this recipient

totalExcludedContact.description: Total number of excluded contacts from all selected lists

contactsFromLists.description: Contacts from all selected contact lists created after campaign launch

campaignLaunchDate.description: Campaign launch date for filtering contacts

videoTemplateId.description: Video template ID - required when enabled is true

templateData.description: Template configuration data with field values and template variables

status.description: Campaign status must be "preparing" for preview mode

previewContactIds.description: Contact IDs to fully prepare as preview (min: 1, max: 10). If not provided, will randomly select 5 contacts.

previewCount.description: Number of recipients to fully prepare as preview (min: 1, max: 10). Only used if previewContactIds is not provided.

previewRecipients.description: List of fully prepared preview recipients

draftRecipients.description: Number of recipients in draft status

preparingRecipients.description: Number of recipients in preparing status

estimatedProcessingTime.description: Estimated time to process all remaining recipients (in seconds)

recipientIds.description: Specific recipient IDs to process. If not provided, all draft recipients will be processed

batchSize.description: Number of recipients to process in each batch

failedRecipients.description: List of recipients that failed to process

isComplete.description: Whether all recipients have been processed

batchSize.description: Number of recipients to process in each batch

recipientIds.description: Specific recipient IDs to launch. If provided, only these recipients will be launched and the campaign will become live. If not provided, all ready recipients will be launched.

failedRecipients.description: List of recipients that failed to launch

isComplete.description: Whether all recipients have been launched

spreadsheetId.description: Google Sheets ID (required for google_sheets format)

webhookUrl.description: Webhook URL to notify when export is complete

shareWithEmail.description: Email to share Google Sheet with editor access (required for google_sheets format)

googleSheetsUrl.description: Google Sheets URL (for Google Sheets export)

deliveryDate.description: Delivery date (ISO string, defaults to current time if not provided)

deliveryAddress.description: Delivery address where the package was delivered
